426a1('dul ba): gyur pas/ de'i phyir bdag la bka' stsal gyis/ tsan dan sa mchog thams cad khyer te 'gro'o snyam nas/ des tsan dan sa mchog gi dum bu gsum ras kyi nang du dkris te/ gcig lag tu
426a2('dul ba): thogs nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gang po tsan dan sa mchog cung zad yod dam/ des smras pa/ lha 'dir mchis so// 'di la rin ji tsam/ gser 'bum mo// gzhan yod dam/ lha

427a3('dul ba): pa'i tshogs kho na blang bar bya'o zhes bcas nas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir blang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba byas pa de'i tshe ci kho bo 'am/ kho bo'i phu nu dag la bsgo 'am/ khyed 'o

428b6('dul ba): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / des de snying la bzung nas de rnams dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te gru bo cher grub nas slar lhags so// de'i phu bo 'byor len gyis bsam

429a1('dul ba): shig/ des smras pa/ bdag 'dod pa mi 'tshal gyi/ gal te gnang na rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag khyim gyi 'tshon ma lam zhugs pa de'i tsher
429a2('dul ba): tu mi 'byung bar/ de ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ de'i tshe ni mi rigs lags so// da ni rigs lags so// des de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo // des smras pa/
429a3('dul ba): bu bo rgya mtsho chen po na nyes dmigs ni mngal/ mnog ni chung ngo // der 'jug pa ni mang la/ slar 'khor ba ni nyung bas/ khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o// khyod
429a4('dul ba): la rigs pas bsgrubs pa'i nor phal mo che yod la/ khyod kyi nu bo dag la rigs pa ma yin pas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ gal te de dag na re lhan cig 'khod par bya'o zhes zer na/ 'dug par mi bya'o zhes
429a5('dul ba): smras nas/ rim gro pa gcig khrid de mnyan yod du song ste/ mnyan yod kyi skyed mos tshal du 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'phrin pa btang ste/ khyim bdag ded dpon gang po khyim bdag lta bar 'a/
429a6('dul ba): nas skyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes spring ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar chu'i bzhon pas dub nas/ da ni thang gi bzhon pas 'ongs so snyam mo// de nas dris pa/ kye nang rje zong ji snyed cig
429a7('dul ba): khyer te 'ongs/ / de la zong ga la yod rim gro pa dang gnyis bu ste/ de dang bdag tu bas so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gang dag gis skyes bu dam pa de la bkur sti ma byas par khyim du bong ba ni
429b1('dul ba): bdag rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des de bkur sti chen pos khyim du bos nas bsku mnyes te khrus byas nas/ zan byin te dga' ba'i gtam byas te 'dug nas/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis dris pa/ ded
429b2('dul ba): dpon dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ khyim bdag bdag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
429b3('dul ba): sbyin gyis ro stong nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du rjodra pas ched du brjod pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'i chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ kye ma'o chos leg par gsungs pa nyid de la ni// da skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu
429b4('dul ba): yang rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi cho ga rgya chen po dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / mdzod byas pa rnams kyang spangs nas/ leg par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong
429b5('dul ba): dngos po 'dod par gyur to/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ded dpon gang po khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhug nas
429b6('dul ba): chos 'chad do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang chas te 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas spyi
429b7('dul ba): skyes dang chas te nga ltar 'ong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta bu med de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i skyes bu'o// de ma khyi ma bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis mgo bos byag
430a1('dul ba): byas te/ ded dpon gang po dang lhan cig phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
430a2('dul ba): btsun pa ded dpon gang po 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par
430a3('dul ba): rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ded dpon gang po la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog/
430a4('dul ba): tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar de skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ sgra dang spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag ra lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum
430a5('dul ba): thogs pa dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs ras lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog gsungs pas de// sgra byin snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la
430a6('dul ba): dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// de nas dus gzhar zhig na tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
430a7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
430b1('dul ba): las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos pa ji lta bus gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang rtul ba dang ldan la/ bdag nyid gtod cing gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad
430b2('dul ba): du gsol/ gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang rtun pa dang ldan la/ bdag nyid la gtod cing gnas na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas
430b3('dul ba): khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na ma mchis pa de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrub nas/ bdag gi skye ba ni/
430b4('dul ba): zad do// tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do// bya ba ni byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyid pa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad
430b5('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to/ / gang po le gr-i so legs so// gang po gang khyod 'di skad du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba nas/ de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa le gra par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar smra ba ni/
430b6('dul ba): yang leg so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/ de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod/
430b7('dul ba): pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas mngon par dga' ba dang / mngon par bstod pa dang / lhag par chags pa dang / lhag par zhen cing gnas na/ de dag la
431a1('dul ba): mngon par dga' ba dang / mngon par stod pa dang / lhag par chags pa dang / lhag par zhen cing gnas pa de la kun tu dga' ba 'byung ngo // kun tu dga' ba yod na dka' ba dang mi
431a2('dul ba): bde bar 'gyur ro/ / dga' ba dang yid bde ba yod na kun tu chags par 'gyur ro// kun tu chags pa yod na kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur te/ dka' ba dang / kun tu chags pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i
431a3('dul ba): dge slong ni/ gang po mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o// gang po rna ba rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang
431a4('dul ba): lus rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba rnam
431a5('dul ba): yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma yin no// gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa
431a6('dul ba): dang / chaklupa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chag par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas mngon par mi dga' ba dang / mngon par mi bstor ba dang
431a7('dul ba): lhag par ma chags pa dang / lhag par mi zhen cing gnas na/ de dag la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / mngon par mi bstod pa dang / lhag par ma chags pa dang / skrag par ma zhen par gnas pa de la kun tu ban
431b1('dul ba): ba mi 'byung ngo / / kun tu dga' ba med na dga' ba dang yid bde ba med par 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang yid bde ba med na kun tu ma chags par 'gyur ro// kun tu chags pa med na kun tu sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro//
431b2('dul ba): kun tu sbyor ba med na dga' ba dang / kun tu chags pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ gang po mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o// gang po rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang
431b3('dul ba): snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang / chags pa dang /
431b4('dul ba): dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong dag gis mthong nas zhes bya ba dang / de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar
431b5('dul ba): gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 'ar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / gang po ngas mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis khyod la gtams na gang du gnas par 'dod/ gang du gnas bca' bar 'dod/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
431b6('dul ba): mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis bdag gtams lags pas/ 'gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar mchis par 'tshal lags so// gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa/
431b7('dul ba): gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ gshe ba/ spro thung ba/ 'phya ba yin te/ gang po gal te khyod la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams mngon sum du sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar
432a1('dul ba): byed/ zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam du byed/ btsun pa gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum du sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i
432a2('dul ba): tshig rtsub pos gshe bar bgyid/ zher 'debs par bgyid// 'phya bar bgyid na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no// e ma'o groba'in
432a3('dul ba): skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar byed/ zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed kyang lag pa'am/ bong bsam
432a4('dul ba): brgya pa snyam mo/ / gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gang po gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis
432a5('dul ba): dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab na/ de la khyod ji snyam byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab par gyur na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du
432a6('dul ba): sems te/ kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba yin no// kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la dbyug pa'am/ mtshon gyis
432a7('dul ba): brgyab kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar mi byed do snyam mo/ / gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ste
432b1('dul ba): gal te gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis/ khyod thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams
432b2('dul ba): kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar bgyid na/ de la bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos lus rnag can/ 'dis skyo ba dang / ngo tsha ba dang / rnam
432b3('dul ba): par smod pa gang dag mtshon gyis kyang 'debs par byed/ dug kyang phra bar byed/ thag pas kyang 'gegs te 'chi bar byed/ g.yangs nas kyang mchongs te 'chi ba yod na/ kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i
432b4('dul ba): mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no/ / kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag gi lus rnag can 'di las tshegs chung ngus grol bar byed do snyam bsam par bgyi'o// /
432b5('dul ba): gang po legs so legs so// gang po khyod bzod pa dang nges pa 'di dang ldan par gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar gnas par nus pa ni khyod yang legs so// gang po song la ma bsgral ba rnams ni sgrol cig/
432b6('dul ba): ma grol ba rnams ni khrol cig/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbyugs phyung zhig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
432b7('dul ba): mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spya snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/
433a1('dul ba): dro sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms
433a2('dul ba): las slar log ste/ gnas mal ji ltar longs spyad pa mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha' gang na ba der chas de rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na/ kro
433a3('dul ba): bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po sde dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung 'azed dang chos gos thogs te/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mthar bsod snyoms ma zhugs pa/ rngon pa
433a4('dul ba): zhig mda' gzhu lag tu thogs te/ ri dgas 'chor du 'gro ba des mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni rje ma rung bar byas so snyam bsams nas/ gzhu rna drung bkang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
433a5('dul ba): po gang na ba der brgyugs pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bla gos snyil te smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dgang dka' ba 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snyun cig/ tshigasu bcad de yang
433a6('dul ba): smras pa/ gang gi don du mkha' la bya rgyu ri dgas rnyis zin gyur// g.yul ngor mda' mdung mda' bo che thogs mi rnams mchi 'gyur la// bkren pa nyon mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil pas na zin pa/ sdig pa rab
433a7('dul ba): mang lto 'dir khyod kyis tsham rings mda' 'phongs shig/ des bsams pa/ rab tu byung ba 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bzod pa dang / nges pa dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di mda' 'phang snyam du bsams nas/ de sems mngon
433b1('dul ba): par dad par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang / des ri khrod der gzhan lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen du byas lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen mar byas/
433b2('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang lnga brgya pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / kor thabs brgya phrag du ma 'bul du bcug go/ zla ba gsum po de 'das pa dang / des rig pa gsu
433b3('dul ba): lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dngacas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang
433b4('dul ba): mngon sum du smra ba bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na shing gyi rna cha can gyi nu bo gnyis longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su zad la gtugs par gyur nas/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ b+hur lta bu
433b5('dul ba): de bdag gi khyim nas song gis/ tshur shog lhan cig gnas par bya'o// des smras pa/ byur lta bu de gang zhig yin/ gang po yin mod/ de ni kho bo'i khyim nas dpal byung ba yin gyi/ dbyur lta bu ni ma yin no//
433b6('dul ba): de gnyis kyis smras pa/ dpal yang rung / byur yang rung / tshur shog/ lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o// des smras pa/ khyed cag gi nor ni rigs par bsgrubs pa ma yin la/ kho bos ni rigs par bsgrubs pa yin
433b7('dul ba): pas/ khyed cag dang kho bor lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho chen por yang song yang song nas khyod kyi longs spyod dag bsgrubs pas/ khyod de spyad pas rgyags su zad
434a1('dul ba): khyod kyis ni rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par gal nus/ de de gnyis las nga rgyal bzung nas/ des bsams pa// 'dag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgya mtsho
434a2('dul ba): por zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / ji tsam na gru bo che de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal du bdas so// sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag tsan dmas mchog gi tshal zhes grag pa gang yin
434a3('dul ba): pa de ni 'di yin gyis/ 'di las gdoms la long zhig/ de'i tshe tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal gyi dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba yin te/ de yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ngo // de nas
434a4('dul ba): tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcad par brtsams so/ / gnod sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i/ tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang
434a5('dul ba): phyug chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ tsan danas mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis 'gums na/ khyod kyi 'phrin
434a6('dul ba): las sam bgyi ba gang lags pa de mdzod cig/ de nas gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun ma byas nas mi bzod pa skyes te/ rlung nag po chen po 'jigs su rung ba bslang nas/ tsan danas
434a7('dul ba): mchog gi tshal gang na ba der rmas so/ / sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig/ rlung nag po chen po 'jigs pa 'jigs pa zhig yod do// zhes grag pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin
434b1('dul ba): gyis ngo lon soms shig/ de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 'jigs skrag phongs te ba spu khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ lha rnams la gsol bar byed par rtsom ste/ zhi ba dang ni chu lha lus ngan nor sogs
434b2('dul ba): dang / lha mi lto 'phye gnod sbyin lha min dbang po rnams// bdag cag shin tu nyam thag 'jigs par gyur lags kyis// bsnyengs bral de ring bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig/ mi rnams kyi ni kha cig bde sogs
434b3('dul ba): khyod la 'dud/ / gzhan dag tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen dang // sar rten shing dang tshal la rten pa la// sha za'i rlung gis brin pas skyabs tshol 'dud// shing gi rna cha can sems las chung ngus 'dug pa dang / tshong pa rnam
434b4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ ded dpon bdag cag ni sdug mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur na/ khyod ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo la nu bos bsgo ba/ phu bo rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni
434b5('dul ba): mnog chung la nyes dmigs mang ba ste/ sred pas ldongs pa phal cher 'jug pa ni slar 'khor ba nyung bas/ khyod kyis rnam pa gang gis kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o zhes bsgo ba las/ kho bos de'i tshig ma mnyan te/
434b6('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por zhubs pas da ci byar yang med do// khyod kyi nu bo gang yin/ gang po yin no// tshong pa'i tshogs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa gang po de ni bsod rnams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa
434b7('dul ba): yin gyis/ de nyid la bdag cag skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o zhes/ de thams cad kyis tshig mthun par 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo//
435a1('dul ba): phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la mngon par dga' ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces
435a2('dul ba): @smras so/ / 'phags pa khyod kyi gcen ni sdug bsngal mi 'brad pa nyam nga bar gyur gyis dgongs su gsol/ des bsams te/ de de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pa na/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas
435a3('dul ba): mi snang bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/ rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur to// gnod
435a4('dul ba): sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsams pa/ sngon chad ni rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal gyi 'dab bu bzhin 'phangs pa dang 'jig par 'gyur na/ da rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/ rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par
435a5('dul ba): gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/ phan tshun du brtag par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa gang po gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang des smras pa/ 'phags pa gang
435a6('dul ba): po mtho btsams te ci bgyi/ gang pos smras pa/ rna ba'i chos can kho bo nyid mthos patsam mam/ gal te ngas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tsho gas mthob par gyur na/ khyod kyis nga'i phu 'o ma'i lus par byas par 'gyur
435a7('dul ba): ro/ / dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ 'phags pa tsan danas mchog 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i don du srung lags so// gang pos smras pa/ dpon po ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
435b1('dul ba): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang che/ 'phags pa ci bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam/ byung ngo // gal te de lta na dgang ma gang de khong zhig/ de nas tshod pa'i tshogs de
435b2('dul ba): rnams srog byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon par dad nas/ gru de tsan dan sa mchog gis bkang ste chas pa dang / rim gyis grong khyer slo ma lta bur phyin to// de nas gang pos/ phu bo la smras pa/ gang gi ming gi gru bo cher
435b3('dul ba): gru'i nor grub ste 'ongs pa de ni de dbang bas/ khyod kyis rin po che ni tshong pa 'di rnams la bgos shig/ bdag gis ni tsan dan sa mchog 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan dan gyi 'phreng khang bzangs brtsig go//
435b4('dul ba): des tshong pa de rnams la rin po che rnams bgos so// de nas gang pos tsan dan sa mchog gi khang babrangs zhig brtsig par brtsams te/ des babro bo dag bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci nyi ma re re zhir
435b5('dul ba): kar sha pa Na lnga brgya len nam/ 'on te tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang len/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang 'tshal lo// ji tsam ni ring po ma thogs par tsan
435b6('dul ba): ngan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs brtsegs te/ byi dor thams cad zin par gyur to// de na zhogs ma dang phye ma'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag kyang btags nas de nyid la zhal zhal du byugs so// des spun de rnams phan tshun
435b7('dul ba): thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug nas smras pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs la zhal zas gsol cig/ 'phags pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs/ mnyan
436a1('dul ba): ma na'o/ / sam ji srid mchis/ mnyan yod du dpag tshad brgya lhab tsam mo// re zhig rgyal po la brtag par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas/ swa bdas
436a2('dul ba): cag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te/ zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ rung gis de bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po khang
436a3('dul ba): steng du 'dzegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal lobs su kha bltas te/ pus mo sgang gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug nas me tog gis gtor/ 'dug pas bdugs nas/ khyim bzhig gser gyi byam bum 'dzin du
436a4('dul ba): bcug ste/ gsol ba 'debs pa zhugs pa/ tshul khrims rnam dag shin tu rnam ngas blo// zhal zas dus su rtag tu don gzigs pa// mgon med gyur pa rab tu gzigs nas ni/ shin tu thugs brtses mdzad de
436a5('dul ba): gshegs par gsol/ / de nas me tog de rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog gi khang babrangs su byas te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgan rims bzhin du gnas par gyur to/
436a6('dul ba): 'dug pa ni sprin lngar spungs so// chu na bai DUR+Ya'i phur ma lta bur gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa spyan 'dren pa bang
436a7('dul ba): nas mchis/ kun dga' bo grong khyer sbom lta bu nas so// btsun pa grong khyer sbom lta bur ji srid cig mchis/ kun dga' bod pa sa tshad brgya lhag tsam yod kyis/ song la dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang dang gang / sang srong
436b1('dul ba): khyer slo ma lta bur song nas zan phra bar spro ba tshul shing long zhig ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan yod nas tshul shing blangs te/ bcom ldan
436b2('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshul shing blangs so// de'i tshe yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa gang po// shes rab kyis rnam
436b3('dul ba): par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des kyang tshul shing blang bar brtsams pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zan 'di ni// ko sa la bdag
436b4('dul ba): po'i pho brang ngam/ / rab sbyin khyim dang ri dgas kyi// khyim gyi bras yang ma lags so// grong khyer sbo ma zhes bya ba// dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bzhud 'tshal bas// gang po khyod
436b5('dul ba): nim gsung bzhugs/ / de shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin gyis/ des rdzu 'phrul ma bskyed pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag bsal zhing bor la spangs
436b6('dul ba): shing so sor spangs na/ bdag mu stegs can dang thun mong ba'i rdzu 'phrul sgyid lug gam snyam nas/ des brtson 'grus la gnas te rdzu 'phrul bskyed pas/ ji srid tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan
436b7('dul ba): gsum pa la tshul shing ma byin pa de'i bar du/ des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blangs te/ de nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ go'u tam 'di na mngon shes drug po nyid// grags pa
437a1('dul ba): dang ni thos pas thob min la/ tshan gyi yon tan rnams dang ngaka dang ni// yid smon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi// bdag 'dra yongs su rtog par byed pa rnams// rga bas dar yal gyur kyang
437a2('dul ba): zhi ba dang / / tshul khrims lhag mthong stobs dang bsam gtan stobs// rnam pa du mas mngon shes drug ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge sbyong 'di ni
437a3('dul ba): nga'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/ nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang ba la dang po'o// tshul shing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po mchog yin
437a4('dul ba): no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la/ ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spoms pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab
437a5('dul ba): par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang grong khyer de na mu stegs pa rnams gnas pas khyed las gang gis rdzul phrul gang thob pa de/ des grong khyer slom lta bur song la zan bza' bar bya'o// /
437a6('dul ba): zhes sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
437a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces/ ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi zhes bya ba nas/ song la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
437b1('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ / rgyal pos grong khyer slo ma lta bur rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i bog por sna tshogs bshams/ dar gyi chun
437b2('dul ba): 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram ste/ dga' dga' ltar byas so// grong khyer slom lta bu la sgo bcod brgyad yod la/ rgyal po de la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/ grong khyer gyi sgo re rer so
437b3('dul ba): sor rgyal po'i bu rnam 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do/ / sgo chen por ni slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skyegs rna cha can dang / zha
437b4('dul ba): nye'i rna cha can 'dug go/ ji tsam na lo ma 'drim pa dang / shang tshe 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drim pa dag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ de
437b5('dul ba): smras pa/ 'di dag ni lo ma 'drim pa dang / shang tshe 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drim pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs
437b6('dul ba): pa rnam pa du mas lhags pa dang / rgyal pos yang dris pa/ ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ ma lags te/ 'di dag ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan
437b7('dul ba): la snyoms par zhugs pa/ rnam pa du mas lhags pa lags so// de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig seng ge stag dang glang po che rta klu dang khyung mchog bzang po bci bas/
438a1('dul ba): kha cig rin chen gzhal khang dang ri dang shing mdzes shing rta 'bar la brten// gzhan dag nam mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzin klog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa lta bur ni// rab tu dgyes bzhin lha mi pho
438a2('dul ba): brang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag gis gshegs par brtsom/ / kha cig sa brtol gyen du 'byung // kha cig nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab/ kha cig stan las sprul par byed// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos// de nas bcom
438a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skra drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go//
438a4('dul ba): ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu ra
438a5('dul ba): tu g.yos so/ / chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na ni shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyog
438a6('dul ba): mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' 'o// rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di ci zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das
438a7('dul ba): kyis mngon par 'du byed pa bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa lags so// des na bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od gzer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od
438b1('dul ba): ste/ des 'dzam bu'i gling gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to// yang rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur pas mig phye nas dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di ci lags/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
438b2('dul ba): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od gzer bkye ba lags so/ / // 'dul ba bzhi// / bam po nyi shu lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor
438b3('dul ba): dul ba zhi ba 'bor zhig/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu slom lta bur gshegs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des ba ku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes
438b4('dul ba): na rjes bzhin du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / ba ga la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos
438b5('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad de/ thos nas lha de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to// ji
438b6('dul ba): tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na/ yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
438b7('dul ba): mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems
439a1('dul ba): dang ba chen po skyes so/ / 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyi sems can gyis/ dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems
439a2('dul ba): goms par byas pa dang / bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang / dngul pos gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no// de nas bcom
439a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
439a4('dul ba): byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
439a5('dul ba): bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag cag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma
439a6('dul ba): bgyis te/ phas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lhas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong
439a7('dul ba): dang bram ze sa ma lags pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bi kum/ thar pa dang /
439b1('dul ba): mtho ris kyi sgo ni phye nas/ bdag cag lha dang mi rnams su ni bkod de/ btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun pa
439b2('dul ba): skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ de dag stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
439b3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang sen mo bregs te byin
439b4('dul ba): node dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten zhig brtsigs so/ / de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/ mchod rten de'i 'khor sar pa ku la'i yal ga de bskyed
439b5('dul ba): debacom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mchod rten 'di la bgyi ba bgyid cing mchis so zhes de de nyid na gnas so// de la kha cig gis ni yugs sa mo'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so//
439b6('dul ba): cig gis ni ba ku la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan zhig na
439b7('dul ba): drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/ de dag gi bsti gnas de me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pas/ de dag des rgyagla nas ci yang mi sem so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/
440a1('dul ba): @bsti gnas der gshegs te byon pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras bu ni chags/ rgyu ni skam ga/ ne 'ugasing rnams ni thogs/ 'dug gnas dag ni ba rtib po// de nas drang srong
440a2('dul ba): de dag lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing
440a3('dul ba): rkang gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs na/ bdag cag ni gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa
440a4('dul ba): ciste ma rung / ji sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang / sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas de dag mchog tu ma mtshan du
440a5('dul ba): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang song lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang / bkra la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun
440a6('dul ba): pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
440a7('dul ba): debacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
440b1('dul ba): sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la sgra dang kha spu
440b2('dul ba): byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang / skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas
440b3('dul ba): par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ sangs dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/
440b4('dul ba): de dag gis 'bad pa dang brtsal bar brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ mngon du smra bar bya bar
440b5('dul ba): gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin du'o/ / de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i drang srong gang pa des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cha byad 'dis skye bo'i tshogs chen po bsdus pa de dag je dad pa
440b6('dul ba): skyes par bgyis la/ slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas// de nyid du rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gyi nam mkha'
440b7('dul ba): las gshegs te rim gyis gtun ril byon no/ / de'i tshe gtun ril drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
441a1('dul ba): kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas/ kun nas mdzes pargyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du'o// mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par
441a2('dul ba): gyur te/ de dad pa skyes nas bsams pa/ ma la bdag ri las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das blta zhing 'gror ni/ bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag nyid mchod bar bya'o snyan nas/ des ri las bdag nyid
441a3('dul ba): mchongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas// bcom ldam 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
441a4('dul ba): bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas shing gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
441a5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba dang /
441a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams
441a7('dul ba): kyi mchog ni yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong shing gos can no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer sgo ma lta bur gshegs so// bcom
441b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na/ gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas/ ma lang rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi
441b2('dul ba): nam mkha' las grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so/ / de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skyegs kyi rna cha can dang / !
441b3('dul ba): tenye'i rna cha can dang / rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya stong
441b4('dul ba): phrag du mas zham ring byas shing tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan
441b5('dul ba): 'das ma mthong ngo / / tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig la thug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig par gyur na/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi
441b6('dul ba): bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur
441b7('dul ba): bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul lo/ / de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong
442a1('dul ba): phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ kha gcig gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ kha cig gis ni nan
442a2('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon
442a3('dul ba): sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// 'khor de phal cher sangs
442a4('dul ba): rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skyegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can gyis gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
442a5('dul ba): dag sta gon byas nas gdan bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus chod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs chod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la
442a6('dul ba): bab par dgongs su gsol/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang 'ge'u ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sbo ma lta bu na chos 'chad kyis
442a7('dul ba): dong la mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang / grong khyer sbo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' pa'i chos can yin pas/
442b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang ba ke'u ta ma bdi gnyis gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/ yul phung bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
442b2('dul ba): mo'ung gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms long zhig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ glo bur
442b3('dul ba): ba dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dge skos so// skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das dge skos su dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' las
442b4('dul ba): gshegs so/ / bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang bge'u ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po grong khyer sbo ma lta bu la soms la yul phung bar ma bya
442b5('dul ba): zhig/ de gnyis kyis gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi dgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na/ sbo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de nas bcom
442b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang 'ge'u tam la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo // bcom
442b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsams pa/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi chu'i btung ba gsol la snyom mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal
443a1('dul ba): te gcig gi chu gsol na ni/ des na gzhan dang gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
443a2('dul ba): 'a gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u gal gyi bu song la gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khong la khyer te shog cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo 'u 'gal gyi bu
443a3('dul ba): chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ gang du chu bo lnga brgya pa dris pa de nas chus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i
443a4('dul ba): chu phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pha dang mas ni bu gsos
443a5('dul ba): bsrings bskyed de nus mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu gling gi sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/ cig shos la ni ba bzhag nas lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/
443a6('dul ba): sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ de lta bu'i dbang phyug la
443a7('dul ba): bdag por bcug kyang / bus pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa 'am// lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/
443b1('dul ba): so sor 'god par byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
443b2('dul ba): la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed na/ de tsam gyis bus pa dang ma la phan 'dogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gis ni ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyis/ ma la bdag
443b3('dul ba): gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas bsam pa la/ zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can du skyes par mthong ngo // des de su'i gdul ba yin par brtags na/ bcom ldan 'das
443b4('dul ba): kyis yin par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
443b5('dul ba): do/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma ni bu la shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can du skyes te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das
443b6('dul ba): kyis 'dul bar 'gyur pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung sde gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dod/ bcom
443b7('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag gi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gom pa bor zhing gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can du byon to// bu mo bzang
444a1('dul ba): @mo des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste spras pa/ kye mdo yun ring zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // kye mtho yun ri
444a2('dul ba): mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo / / de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di ni rgan na/ ji lta bu mo 'di de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa mo bu 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag
444a3('dul ba): kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/ des na kho bo'i ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i
444a4('dul ba): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
444a5('dul ba): / des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum gyis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad par/
444a6('dul ba): ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad de// mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig/ nyes dang bral bas dag
444a7('dul ba): pa dang 'dir thob/ / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang gi thob nas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis rgal// 'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa// skye rga 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba// srid pa
444b1('dul ba): snong du rnyed pa rab dka' ba/ / thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun pa skyabs su mchilagra
444b2('dul ba): kyis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das mo'u ba gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor
444b3('dul ba): zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang
444b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grang du mar gtsang zhing bsod
444b5('dul ba): pa'i bza' ba dang bca' pa dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/
444b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te/ ltung
444b7('dul ba): bzed 'khru bar byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o// gal te de lta
445a1('dul ba): na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'o skol byon lags sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yu bu phyin zin to// de nas ngo mtshar du dang ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ coM
445a2('dul ba): ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yid mgyogs yin no// btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni bdag gi glo bar ma chung ngo // gal te bdag gi glo bar chud par gyur na bdag
445a3('dul ba): gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ nga ni shing chog pa bzhin ci bgyir yang ma mchis so//
445a4('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/ nor mngag
445a5('dul ba): longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las ci ga bgyis na nges bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan
445a6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ bod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas//
445a7('dul ba): gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gyis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shong bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams la
445b1('dul ba): 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te//
445b2('dul ba): las rnam bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa
445b3('dul ba): na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha
445b4('dul ba): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bod srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sir nye bar brtan cing bzhugs so// de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum
445b5('dul ba): par gyur te/ chos bzhin gyi dge 'dun gyi zhal ta pa byed do// re zhig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge skos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer
445b6('dul ba): bar gyur to/ / des bsam+ba pa/ re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhag go snyam pa las/ ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong nas/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub pa'i las phyung ba/
445b7('dul ba): bran mo'i bu zhig dag skos byed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas re zhig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o snyam nas gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe
446a1('dul ba): de'i drung du song ste smras khyod kyis kho bo su yid shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te khyod dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin
446a2('dul ba): no/ / des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyi/ kho bos ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas so// kho bo ni 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/ khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas/ khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'i
446a3('dul ba): las phyung grigs pa lnga zhes pa shog shig dang / / des na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro// des nyes pa las nyes par bshags pas/ sems can dmyal bar skye zhing
446a4('dul ba): bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par/ tsha rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/ da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to// gang yang
446a5('dul ba): dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so// gang yang de na bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mtha
446a6('dul ba): pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so//
446a7('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin// gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnam kyi ni 'dren ma yin no//
446b1('dul ba): dge slong dag de sta bas na las gcig tu gnas pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
446b2('dul ba): kyis de skad ces bkar stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o// de'i tshe rgyal por
446b3('dul ba): khab na/ klu'i rgyal po grog ma bar dang ri bo gnas so// de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / tshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su char
446b4('dul ba): gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na/ de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi
446b5('dul ba): ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo / / de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo 'di snyam du sems te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'di gnyis/ ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re
446b6('dul ba): re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni bzang po ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom
446b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
447a1('dul ba): 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyab su dong zhing
447a2('dul ba): chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su dong nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod
447a3('dul ba): lhag par 'phel bar gyur to/ / de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag
447a4('dul ba): cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyab su mchis shing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnam mnos pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes
447a5('dul ba): su gnang na/ bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis/ rgyal po la rtog shig/ de gnyis kyi bsam pa
447a6('dul ba): dang / don gyis na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma kanang ngo zhes smras nas/ de nyid na gnas so// klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gro nA nil+lA'i
447a7('dul ba): bu'i cha byad kyis so/ / 'on te nyin par na ni khyim bdag gi cha byad gyis so// de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byang du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do// rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rig kyi
447b1('dul ba): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das lta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ 'ga' zhig bdag mthong na ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed de/ des mi gnang chen zhig mngag
447b2('dul ba): takye nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyed bkur byed ltos shig/ de song ba las ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir
447b3('dul ba): ldang bar mi byed snyam nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lags so// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sems pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir ldang
447b4('dul ba): par mi byed kyis 'gro'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang / klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bos rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
447b5('dul ba): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchis na/ ci re zhig rgyal po la bsti stang bgyi bam/ 'on te chos la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag chos la bsti stang blo
447b6('dul ba): shig/ dam pa'i chos la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/ chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed do// tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa'i sadra rgyas gang
447b7('dul ba): yin dang / ma byon sang rgyas gang yin dang / da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa// bzhud dang bzhugs dang byon 'gyur ba// thams cad dam chos bla mar byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas
448a1('dul ba): chos nyid yin/ / de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa// bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya// de gnyis kyis
448a2('dul ba): sdang bas byas so/ / de nas rgyal po mo bzod pa skyes te/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang dang ni 'khrum
448a3('dul ba): pa dang / ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i// dam chos shes par mi nus so// gang gis khro dang bag med pa'i// sems ni dul bar byas pa dang / 'di la mnar
448a4('dul ba): sems spangs pa des/ / legs par gsungs pa shes par 'gyur// rgyal pos bsams pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam
448a5('dul ba): nas/ de sngun las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
448a6('dul ba): dong pa de'i tshe/ khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces sgo zhing / de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang / blon po dag gis bsgo ba/ lha'i zhal nas khyed
448a7('dul ba): cag gnyis nga'i yul nam 'dug cig ces gsung ngo / / de gnyis kyis spras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o// bsams pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis yun ring po zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni tshigs chung ngus grub
448b1('dul ba): po snyam mo/ / de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po phyung nas grog mo chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so// srog mo chung ngu nas grog mo chen por ro// grog mo chen po nas chu bran du'o// chu bran nas chu chen por ro// chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/
448b2('dul ba): gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / mu mi gi dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u na sgra
448b3('dul ba): kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la thug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyos par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to// /
448b4('dul ba): rgyal pos bsams pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang srog mkhar gnas te/ de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chu che
448b5('dul ba): lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par gyur na/ da ni dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang
448b6('dul ba): yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la thug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dkon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung
448b7('dul ba): par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar shi 'am/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba 'am/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba 'am/ des 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang / de lta mod kyi sangs
449a1('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
449a2('dul ba): der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das
449a3('dul ba): la don de rgyas par gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de gnyis ni shi ba yang ma yin/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis kyang mkhyer/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang
449a4('dul ba): ma bzung / de'i 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi/ rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas bskrad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar mi dran na/ de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa
449a5('dul ba): lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po ngas khyod la dran par bya'o// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// de gnyis ni klu'i
449a6('dul ba): rgyal po ri bo dang srog mkhar yin no/ / btsun pa de gnyis gang du mchis/ rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo // bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang ma rung bar mi
449a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na ji ltar bzod pa stsal/ de gnyis tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/ khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang
449b1('dul ba): ngas rtags bstan gyis/ khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi 'am/ rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyong la
449b2('dul ba): klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos de gnyis 'ong ba la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom
449b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang / rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang nas smras pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol
449b4('dul ba): lo/ / rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o// gal te bzod par gyur na 'dir spyon cig/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas/ de
449b5('dul ba): nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyes te/ gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yul ma ka d+har yang mi shor bar 'gyur ro// 'o na yul ma ga d+ha ma rung bar 'gyur mod/ ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar
449b6('dul ba): mi 'gyur/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzangs gnyis brtsigs la/ zla ba drug cing dus mchod kyis shig dang / kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la/ dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o// rgyal pos de bzhin du byas
449b7('dul ba): padang / de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag sa/ rus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do// ji tsam dus gnam nig na de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na/ klu gdug pa dag gis glags
450a1('dul ba): pa/ de dag gis se pa rnams so// po sna ban bram ze se gA'i sngags la ma khas pakunan ni yod de/ des de babacing sa bdag ba pa d+ma/ smye k
450a2('dul ba): a d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no/ / lho phyogs na bram ze mas byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des/ byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de
450a3('dul ba): den rgyal po skye mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ / de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de/ de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas/ de'i cheng du 'gro'o zhes de chas te rim
450a4('dul ba): gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na ser ba chen po bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des bcad par ma nus nas/ de phyir byung nang du
450a5('dul ba): zhugs par byed pa dang / zam ze mes sbyin gyis dris pa/ mkhan po ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad/ des smras pa/ bu ser ba chen po bab pa gcad par ma nus pas mod/ bdag
450a6('dul ba): kyis dbus mo/ / bu legs so// des chu rlung nig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyes so// rgyal po'i khab kyi thus ded dbyis bag rnams mchog tu ngo ma nur du gyur nas// rngan pathogs te zlum che
450a7('dul ba): khyim du dong nas smras pa/ mkhan po rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyis/ rngan pa long zhig ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o// des smras pa/ kho bos ni ma bcad de/
450b1('dul ba): 'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do// de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dang dbang thang sbyin no// de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes de gnas so// des ser ba de dus tha ki tsam zhig gi
450b2('dul ba): bar du sngags kyis bags te mi 'bab par gyur to/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir de la dbang thang
450b3('dul ba): sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/ / bram ze des sngags btul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang / phyir yang sar pa 'bab par gyur to// de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po bram
450b4('dul ba): ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo // mkhan po gal te mchis na bdag cag la sbron cig/ de bzhin du bya'o// de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog
450b5('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po bde mchog la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na/ mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya
450b6('dul ba): ba'i sman mchis kyis/ lha de ston cig dang lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni gtum po yin pas des khyod rlag par mi byas grang / lha re zhig bdag la
450b7('dul ba): sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/ gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'das bu'i tshal ba zhig gang bar gyur kyang / bdag gi ba spu
451a1('dul ba): @#gcig kyang bskyod par rngo mi thog na/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/ bram ze yod do// lha de bkri zhig
451a2('dul ba): dang des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgo ba/ kye nang rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas
451a3('dul ba): bram ze de khrid de chas so/ / ji tsam na mi ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/ bram ze tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha gi mthong ngam/ mthong ngo // de ni klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no// de song ste des
451a4('dul ba): der mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du drags nas des de thogs te yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal ba byin te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du
451a5('dul ba): zhugs so/ / de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang / de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dbang thang sbyin no// des smras pa/
451a6('dul ba): byed cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go// de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis 'chu bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang / khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i rigs bcad do// 'jig rten ni phu
451a7('dul ba): sum chos pa 'dod kyi/ rgud pa dang mi mthun pas/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed
451b1('dul ba): pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/ des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar btags so// de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming ni ser ba zhes bya bar btags so// bram ze mo ni 'khor bral
451b2('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ / mna' ma ni glog ces bya'o// des bsams pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing las byed/ yun ring rab tu sngags kyis bgag par bya'o zhes/ des yun ring por sngags kyis bkag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi
451b3('dul ba): 'bab par gyur to/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir dbang zang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do// bram ze de phrag
451b4('dul ba): dog gi zil gyis non pas/ bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin du ma bcug go// bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la/ spa yang skam du ma bcug go// des sngags kyi cho ga rnams ni bsam na brjed/
451b5('dul ba): sman ni ma bskams pas rul bar gyur to// de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams na snying na ches nas/ de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang / bka' thub kyi
451b6('dul ba): tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/
451b7('dul ba): mer zhugs shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ dug zo zhig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag rang gi skye la thag pas thogs te/ shing gi yal ga las
452a1('dul ba): bya/ 'phyang du chug cig ces/ thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma yin pas/ de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo // des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa
452a2('dul ba): pa gang gis gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung zhig/ der ci zhig bgyi/
452a3('dul ba): der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/ bsams gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/ gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob na/ des na de nyid khyod kyi sdu
452a4('dul ba): bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa yin no/ / 'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na/ gang bsams pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa de ni rngo mo thog na gzhan yang cung
452a5('dul ba): zad ci mchis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig/ de yang rngo mi thogs na gzhan bstan du gsol/ bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs
452a6('dul ba): la gdugs tshod gsol te smon lam thob cig dang / gang bsams pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub po// 'phags pa de ni rngo thog gos bgyi'o zhes/ des bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan dra
452a7('dul ba): tegadugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing // de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mo rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces btab bo//
452b1('dul ba): de la chung mas dris pa/ rje'i sras smon lam ci zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsang la bdag der skye zhing / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces
452b2('dul ba): smon lam btab po/ / legs te bdag kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig/ bus smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig/ de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna' mas
452b3('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig ces byas nas/ de rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang / sprin kha dog lnga pa las char babs te/ rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te kha tag go// klu rab mdzes
452b4('dul ba): shi 'phos nas/ 'khor klu drug khri dang der skyes nas/ de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so// chung ma 'khor bral zhes bya'o// bu ni ri bo can zhes bya'o// bu mo ni ser ba zhes bya'o// mna' ma ni glog ces
452b5('dul ba): bya'o/ / chos nyid kyis klu 'am/ klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par gsum dran par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// des bltas na mi las shi
452b6('dul ba): 'phos so/ / gang du skyes she na/ klu rnams su'o// las gang gis she na/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// ci'i phyir snyam na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir ro// des bsams pa/ ci la
452b7('dul ba): tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la byan mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de lta ma
453a1('dul ba): yin par mthong nas/ res 'khor rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag tshur shog/ yul ma ga d+har deng la char pas lo tog thams cad spun cig/ de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bskrun
453a2('dul ba): pa dang / de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang / gshol mda' tsam gyi cha gyi rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+har sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so// de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/
453a3('dul ba): sog ma yang klu 'dis phrogs so zhes de'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thogs so// // sdom la/ rgyal po'i khab dang na lan da// 'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong // chu bo gang+ga sprin brtsegs
453a4('dul ba): dang / skra chen yangs pa tha ma yin// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis
453a5('dul ba): srad nas/ ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings nas rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ des bcom ldan 'das la kur sti ma yin pa mang po byas brtsams ste/ bkrongs pa man chad
453a6('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir glang po nor skyong dang / khyi gtum po za ba dag spad pa dang / de'i ma lus 'phagasams smras pa/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
453a7('dul ba): rnams ni bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis/ rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang ka dang / mang ga d+ha rnams 'byor cing nyams dga'
453b1('dul ba): ba yin no/ / snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ ci gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag zhig pa dang / stongs par gyur tam/ de mas thams cad kyi thams cad du zlog kyang ma btub nas/
453b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags kyis/ ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i dad pa la bzhag tu re zhig dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du
453b3('dul ba): gshegs so snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas//
453b4('dul ba): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mtha'i rgyal phran dag gos bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur sti ma yin pa byas pas/
453b5('dul ba): de bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs nas/ rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon no zhes thos nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig rgyal po sdig can nges pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan
453b6('dul ba): pa bsad nas/ des kyang mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyis mchod pa de la yang bkur sti ma yin pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur
453b7('dul ba): sde ma yin pas bstengs pa yin pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas/ de yong ye rgyal srid las dbyung bar bya'o/
454a1('dul ba): snyam nas/ de dag gis phan tshun pho nyas bzlugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i
454a2('dul ba): tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshigs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste le bcom nas phru mar bskor te 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i rgyun phab pas
454a3('dul ba): le tog lhag ma rnams ma rung bar byas so/ / dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams skams la thug pas mu ge byung bar gyur to// chu lhags ma gzhan dag kyang mtha'i
454a4('dul ba): rgyal phran dag gis dug gis ma rung ba byas so/ / de nas ma skyes dgra sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ nyam nga bar gyur pa la/ mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de rma la thal bas btab pa ltar
454a5('dul ba): mi ngas byung ste/ khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa brgya du mas snying krugs pas// lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug
454a6('dul ba): / de nas lus 'phags mas spras pa/ bu ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud/ ma gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to// bu kho mos sngar khyod la bcom ldan 'das
